docs.lead_paragraph: AN inconspicuous government publication makes its appearance at this season -- the report of Dr. Louise Stanley, chief of the Bureau of Home Economics, to Henry A. Wallace, Secretary of Agriculture. It is a little report on a big job, touching the lives of 30,000,000 families of consumers, and never more immediately than now.

headline.main: FOOD LESSONS GIVEN BY UNCLE SAM; His Bureau of Home Economics Solves Problems for the Housewife

docs.abstract: Feature article on work of U S Bur of Home Economics; illus
